vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(accrualBlockNumber == 0 && borrowIndex == 0, "market may only be initialized once");
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-sweeptoken-not-restricted
vulnerability_findings.message: Function sweepToken is allowed to be called by anyone

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
ABep20ImmutableCertora.otherToken (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2993-2995) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOfInOther (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#3005-3009)
	- borrowBalanceStoredInOther (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#3009-3013)
	- exchangeRateStoredInOther (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#3013-3017)
	- getCashInOther (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#3017-3021)
	- getCashOfInOther (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#3025-3029)
	- totalSupplyInOther (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#3029-3033)
	- totalBorrowsInOther (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#3033-3037)
	- totalReservesInOther (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#3037-3041)
	- underlyingInOther (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#3041-3045)
	- liquidateBorrowFreshPub (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#3063-3067)

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#123-185) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#149)
	-transferFrom (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#163)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken._addReservesInternal (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2493-2505):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2494-2495)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2501-2502)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken._reduceReserves (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2556-2566):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2557-2558)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2563-2564)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken._setComptroller (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2425-2444):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2433-2434)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2436-2437)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken._setInterestRateModel (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2621-2631):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2622-2623)
	- _setInterestRateModelFresh(newInterestRateModel) (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2628-2629)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2628-2629)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken._setInterestRateModelFresh (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2637-2667):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newInterestRateModel.isInterestRateModel(),marker method returned false) (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2656-2658)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2659-2661)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken._setReserveFactor (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2449-2459):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2450-2451)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reserveFactorMantissa (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2456-2457)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken.accrueInterest (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1626-1704):
	External calls:
	- borrowRateMantissa = interestRateModel.getBorrowRate(cashPrior,borrowsPrior,reservesPrior) (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1643)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1695)
	- borrowIndex (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1696)
	- totalBorrows (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1697)
	- totalReserves (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1698)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken.borrowInternal (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1957-1965):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1958)
	- borrowFresh(msg.sender,borrowAmount) (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1964)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1964)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ABep20Immutable.constructor (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2947-2966):
	External calls:
	- initialize(underlying_,comptroller_,interestRateModel_,initialExchangeRateMantissa_,name_,symbol_,decimals_) (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2959-2961)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- admin (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2962-2963)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken.initialize (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1267-1298):
	External calls:
	- err = _setComptroller(comptroller_) (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1281)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1285)
	- borrowIndex (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1286)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken.liquidateBorrowInternal (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2172-2187):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2173)
	- error = aTokenCollateral.accrueInterest() (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2179)
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,aTokenCollateral) (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2186)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2186)
	- totalReserves (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2186)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken.redeemFresh (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1856-1950):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.redeemAllowed(address(this),redeemer,vars.redeemTokens) (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1896)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSupply (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1939)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken.repayBorrowBehalfInternal (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2067-2075):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2068)
	- repayBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount) (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2074)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2074)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken.repayBorrowInternal (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2051-2059):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2052)
	- repayBorrowFresh(msg.sender,msg.sender,repayAmount) (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2058)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2058)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
ABep20.initialize (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2727-2742) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-EIP20Interface(underlying).totalSupply() (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2739-2740)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: (MathError err, Exp memory fraction) = divScalarByExp(scalar, divisor);
vulnerability_findings.message:
Exponential.divScalarByExpTruncate.fraction (local variable @ ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1117) shadows:
	- ExponentialNoError.fraction (function @ ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#989-991)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function redeemFreshPub(address payable redeemer, uint redeemTokens, uint redeemUnderlying) public returns (uint) {
vulnerability_findings.message:

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in AToken.borrowFresh (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1980-2044):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.borrowAllowed(address(this),borrower,borrowAmount) (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#1982)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountBorrows (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2032)
	- accountBorrows (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2033)
	- totalBorrows (ABep20ImmutableCertora.sol#2034)
